arts.ttl: Nantes predicted XI v OGC Nice: Matthis Abline returns to line-up
arts.sum: Matthis Abline, despite being FC Nantes’ most important player, has spent the start of the season playing a bit-part role. The France youth international has often come off the bench.…

arts.ttl: OGC Nice predicted XI v Nantes: Dante and Jonathan Clauss to return
arts.sum: Franck Haise will welcome back several players, while he may also hand out a couple of debuts as OGC Nice welcome FC Nantes at the Allianz Riviera on Saturday afternoon. …
